How come the Joker world isn't an option? Please make it an option. I really wanted to play that route. üò¢üò≠ Edit 3: Haihai! Going to play the game on an Android! Maybe now I'll be able to play Joker's world... Edit 4: I couldn't play the Joker World on Android either, despite it saying that Android had all of the episodes. I'm kinda disappointed. I was hoping to play his route. I was so excited too....

It's beyond amazing! It's money well spent. I actually think the price is cheap for this high quality. Every route was different and special. I found myself being so immersed in the game. I cried lots for each boy because I've really grown to love them. A standing ovation to the creator/developers of this game! I'll have to say though, the anime failed to give it justice since this was miles better than what they've shown. Regardless, I don't regret watching the anime back when I was younger since it drove me to take a leap and play this wonderful game.
Loved this game, and I would be ecstatic if they other games that continue on from this one, were ever released. I bet I would not be alone in this wish. üòÅ

Just played through Shin and Toma's route. Tbh if Toma's route happened to 
someone in real life I hope they're not like the heroine üòÇ kids don't 
learn from her. But the reason for only 4 stars is that I kept experiencing 
a small bug where I would be playing but one of the characters would stay 
on the screen when they aren't supposed to. Closing the app and reopening 
it and reloading solved the problem but it happened quite a few times. Not 
a huge problem. Anyway, so far the stories are interesting! Loved the art 
and sound. Haven't played many fully-voiced otome games like this, and I'm 
glad this one was my first! A super pleasant experience, I will definitely 
buy Hakuoki as well and hopefully the developer will release more of 
these!! Would definitely buy all Edit: Finished all the routes awhile ago 
but after playing a few other otome games (mainly on ps vita) I realized 
Amnesia is really worth it for its price and storyline! I wish you would 
bring more english versions over !

I love idea factory and all there otome. I really hope that amnesia, world,

I love this game so hard! I first found the anime on Crunchyroll. When I 
finished it I looked it up online out of curiosity and found this game. The 
storylines are so different but similar at the same time. The game gives 
more perspectives on yhe characters. I do not regret paying almost $23 for 
the full version. Please continue to make more games equally as amazing 
(and better!) in the future. I've only completed the first 2 routes so far 
and I'm already hooked so much!
If only the other Amnesia are translated to English

I'm not a fan of otome games... But Amnesia is an otome game I can get behind.  Yeah, there's the usual fanservice, but the story is genuinely intriguing. There are moments that made me laugh, a couple of times when I cried, and several moments when I was afraid for one of the characters.  The heroine has more personality than most otome heroines, and her personality changes depending on which guy you're gunning for.  The artwork is gorgeous. Had lots of fun unlocking it all.  Each guy is fairly well developed. If I had to rank their routes based on my personal enjoyment, I'd go with: Kent > Ukyo > Ikki > Shin > Toma.  ...but I would recommend playing them in the game's suggested order of Shin -> Ikki -> Kent -> Toma -> Ukyo to enjoy the story fully.
Good game! I love it. Never regret paying for premium as no interruption.
Fantastic game words can't even describe how amzingly unique all the stories are!! üíòüòòüòçüíØ

this is the only game i have ever rated on the google play store, because it's just that good. the graphics are beautiful, the gameplay is easy to understand, the endings are varied, it's just overall an incredible game. [semi-spoiler?] my only complaint is that toma made me extremely uncomfortable, but i suppose that can be attributed to the fact the characters are incredibly well-written.
Really love this game. I hope they'll be able to translate more of their game in english and also I hope that its either pc or android version.

Ahhhh, I'm literally dying over here. I'm sooo glad they translated it because otherwise I wouldn't be able to read it. Wish I knew their language. I love this game. Trying every route not knowing what end will come for you at last, trying to uncover their personalities and secrets to see what answers they would like..  I enjoyed it. Especially Ukyo's "Joker world". I'm quite fond of his character because even though he doesn't have such outstanding traits as others, he's kind and he loved heroine with his whole heart until the end, still trying to protect her. The end made me tear up quite a lot. Worth the money.
I really need the sequels!! Will pay for their premium versions anytime!!

I've played this game, literally every character and route possible.  It simply never gets old.  I assumed it would be like most otome games and I was very, very, pleasantly wrong.  Anyway, it's expertly produced and absolutley worth the purchase.  It is irritating when others complain about the cost or access to purchase, it comes down to supporting the art.  People support themselves and families every day with jobs.  You don't ask the guy at McDonald's why you have to pay for your burger.  üòë  If Amnesia Later was ported in English.  I would cry the most beautiful tears of joy.  Give me Kent or give me doom!
replyContent: Thank you for the nice review!

However, I bit a million bullets and decided that this would be my first ever full and officially bought otome game! I was not dissapointed and I like it a lot. Was going to wait until I finished the game to give a review but it some how deleted all my data so now I gotta start over before I can even finish. üò¢But this is looked over because its fun to play over and over again!üòÑ I enjoy it but $31.99 is still pricey and I think it was wrong of you to change it while the description reads $22.99. That is why, I am giving 4 stars. But in spite of all of what I just typed, I would recommend this game. ‚ò∫

But I was too broke to buy the whole thing which was 30 something dollars so I only bought like Shin's path but when the company announced that there was a 40% sale on Dec. 24 & 25, I just bought it. It's a realllllllyy amazing otome game. I love both the game and the anime! Amazing graphics and the voices are really those from the anime! ‚ù§
The game is interesting but it's annoying that it keeps crashing. Is there a way to solve this problem?
replyContent:
We are sorry for the trouble. Please send us an email to gloczus-support@googlegroups.com with as much details as possible about your problem, and we will assist you.
Please include your device model and OS version. Thank you.

content: Please translate the sequel too! I love Ikki! ‚ô§‚ô§‚ô§

I really liked the game.  The anime adaption was interesting too.  The voices and art is amazing!  Hope the other Amnesia games get added too.  I wish more idea factory/otomate games get ported to android...  I'm waiting for norn9. Though it is on psvita, I don't own the console.  Japan's google play store has the game... :'(
That is all.

As a long time follower of Otomate/Idea Factory works who has wished for many years to see their games translated, I was really excited when I heard my dreams had been answered with Amnesia. Having just finished the last good ending, I want to say the story and characters were every bit as amazing as I had hoped. I would love to see Amnesia Later and will cross my fingers for it. Will definitely be getting the steam limited edition and even though I own the psp Hakuoki, I am on my way to get the app. I cannot recommend these games enough to visual novel fans! Definitely worth our support to get more translated like Hiiro no Kakera or Wand Factory.
Amazing graphics and artwork, no bugs so far and the game is great :)

It sometimes crashes and the screen goes all weird when I turn off the phone for a second and turn it back on. But overall, the translations were really good and I enjoyed this! I hope you guys publish another translated game, Amnesia Later & Crowd

Worth the money to play it. The voices are fantastic! What really drew me in are the character designs and the story. The heroine is lovely. Very easy to control and such fun to explore all of the different routes!

Thanks for translating Idea Factory/Otomate works and importing them into mobile. There were a few translation and grammatical errors peppered throughout the game, but not enough to be annoying. Worked well on my tablet. I definitely look forward to more of this kind of games translated from the IF/Otomate arsenal of games. Might I suggest "Will o Wisp" and "Hanayaka Nari, Waga Ichizoku"?
Worth the money really enjoying the game. Have played Shins rota, ikkis and started Kents. The side games are fun too. I hope the other amnisia games get translated too.
Yes Yes! More please? I will buy them all I promise! Readers, if you like/love Hakuoki you'll need this one too.
I love this game (Ôæâ*ÔæüÔΩ∞Ôæü)Ôæâ

The best otome game I've played. It is very well worth the money.  You get the visual along with them sexy voices!  Way better than voltage games. The chapters are much longer and quality of the scenes are superb. The only thing is that it did crash on me a few times with Kent's story but I just restart the app and everything is fine.
Fantastic! BRING ON AMNESIA LATER & CROWD

I've heard a lot about Amnesia and read walkthroughs, so I was so excited to play this game that I opened it right after purchasing and downloading only to see a black screen that won't change to opening credits no matter how many times I open the app and wait, uninstall and reinstall. I'm running Android version 6.0. Please please please fix this issue.
replyContent: We truly apologize for the trouble. Our team is currently working on a fix the Android 6.0 black screen bug.

content: Soo happy with this game, I loved it. Wish more games of this quality were available to buy, much better than the voltage games I've played they don't even touch this quality of art,story line etc you name it. Do yourself a favor and buy this you won't regret it even for its price you will buy it and be like wooorth ittt!
Was really excited to play this, but every time I opened it the screen eight just turn blank
Soooooooo glad I bought it!!!!
Too good that words aren't enough
OMG it was so sweet and had its funny moments and also had its sad ones. The ending songs are also so beautiful after I finally finished all the routes I couldn't stop crying.  It was priceless.
Amazing game beautiful art. Please release more this is so worth the money!!
I absolutely love this and the premium is definitely a save for your money. The animation is beautiful, everything about it is I love it so much

The game crashes very, very often. I played Kent's route first and it crashed about once every half an hour. Now I'm on Shin's route and it crashes 1-2 times every 10 minutes. That's pretty annoying. Other than this, the game is great. I love the storyline, the graphics, the voices, the music, etc. Well worth the money.

I first thought it was expensive but then this is probably the best otome game Ive ever played. It's a challenging game as well, if youre pinning for a good ending. Ive grown quite emotionally attached to the characters... and I think Ive seriously fallen in love with Ukyo. >__<
Really worth the money. Thank you so much for the english version. I hope you make more in the future. I'll buy them for sure. :)
I thank whoever made this available for us to get it instead of having to fly to Japan.

I don't know how to say this, but I don't why I don't own a psp but I can afford a phone xD Its been long time since I wanted to play this game so much. Its awesome to see these game in English ver~ Now I am waiting patiently for Diabolik Lovers release ~ I bought Hakuoki too and I totally have no regret~

After watching the anime I don't know how long ago, I was really interested in getting this game. When I saw that this game came out and that it is on andriod, I bought it on the spot! :D Anywho, I just started playing the game, and I'm in love. My only complaint so far is that little arrow that floats at the end of the text bubble every time you get a new line of speech. It is very annoying and I can't figure out how to get rid of it. Is there an option or can it stop jumping in the next update made?Thanks

Everything looks just gorgeous. This was really unexpected - rare that otome see NA releases, and especially so on handheld devices. Everything ran smooth, no laggy loading screens, awesome characters and storylines although heroine is a bit dull for my taste but shes the player insert so I understand it. Went in after seeing the anime with Shin and Toma being my personal favs but now I'm just completely enamored by Kent! His good end was the best in the game, imo. Support NA otome releases and download!
Got it on steam already just wanted to show support! Love everything about it keep up the great job
